EmailTemplate.description: LFS Contact Us - Web-to-Case - Company Info Auto-response
EmailTemplate.name: LFS: Contact Us - Company Info (Unauthenticated)
EmailTemplate.subject: Lexus Financial Services - Contact Us Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName}:
Thank you for contacting Lexus Financial Services via the 'Contact Us' link at www.LexusFinancial.com.
Messages sent through this channel are unsecure. As we value your privacy, we will not provide account-specific information through this unsecured channel.
For information regarding Lexus Financial Services, please go to www.LexusFinancial.com and select About Us at the top of the web page. Then select Company Background or Company News for more information.
Thank you for visiting us at www.LexusFinancial.com.
Sincerely, Lexus Financial Services Customer Support
This is a no reply email notification. Replies initiated from this email will neither be delivered nor answered. If you have additional questions, please log in to the Support Center for further assistance.
